item.title: Lovense Ferri Panty Vibrator Review: Super Comfy

review.headline_rewrite: Lovense Ferri Panty Vibrator Review: Super Comfy
bullets: Womanizer introduced the world to its Pleasure Air technology, which simulates oral sex.
More curiously, a couple from New Hampshire created a vibrator that could be worn in a pair of undies and controlled by an app.
There were certainly sex toys that could be held in place with underwear before then; I remember trying one from We-Vibe back in the day, but it wasn't the easiest thing to wear around town.
The Ferri has a shape designed to fit comfortably inside the labia, as opposed to outside or against it.
When you put the Ferri in the crotch of your underwear, it’s held in place by a magnet that’s on the outside of your underwear (funnily enough, like the now-defunct Humane Ai Pin).

item.title: Technology Sep 6, 2025 iOS 26 update: Expected release date, list of Apple iPhones supported, features and more Apple's iOS 26, unveiled at WWDC, is anticipated to launch alongside the iPhone 17 series, potentially around September 15-16. This update introduces a Liquid Glass interface, a redesigned Photos app, and a smarter Siri. Compatible with iPhone 11 and later models, iOS 26 brings features like a new Passwords app, enhanced Messages, and iPhone mirroring on Mac, enhancing user experience.

review.headline_rewrite: Technology Sep 6, 2025 iOS 26 update: Expected release date, list of Apple iPhones supported, features and more Apple's iOS 26, unveiled at WWDC, is anticipated to launch alongside the iPhone 17 series, potentially around September 15-16. This update introduces a Liquid Glass interface, a redesigned Photos app, and a smarter Siri. Compatible with iPhone 11 and later models, iOS 26 brings features like a new Passwords app, enhanced Messages, and iPhone mirroring on Mac, enhancing user experience.
bullets: As the iPhone 17 launch nears, the software update is also rumoured to roll out widely, bringing new features and improvements to millions of devices.

Hereâs everything to know about eligible devices, release date, features and more about iOS 26
iOS 26 release date
Historically, Apple rolls out the latest software update a week after the launch of new iPhones.
If the tradition continues, iOS 26 may roll out on or around September 15-16 this year as the iPhone 17 series launch is scheduled for September 9.

iOS 26 eligible devices
Hereâs the full list of iPhones that will support iOS 26:
- iPhone 16e
- iPhone 16 and 16 Plus
- iPhone 16 Pro and 16 Pro Max
- iPhone 15 and 15 Plus
- iPhone 15 Pro and 15 Pro Max
- iPhone 14 and 14 Plus
- iPhone 14 Pro and 14 Pro Max
- iPhone 13 and 13 mini
- iPhone 13 Pro and 13 Pro Max
- iPhone 12 and 12 mini
- iPhone 12 Pro and 12 Pro Max
- iPhone 11
- iPhone 11 Pro and 11 Pro Max
- iPhone SE (2nd gen and newer)
Readers must note that Apple Intelligence features detailed require supported devices, which include all iPhone 16 models, iPhone 15 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro Max.
- New call features: Live voicemail, call screening, and updated call controls.
- Mail app improvements: Automatically sorts emails into Primary, Transactions, Updates, and Promotions.

‘We have apologised to…’: Australia’s biggest bank decides not to replace human jobs with AI
The Commonwealth Bank of Australia (CBA) has backtracked on its plan to eliminate 45 customer service positions due to AI implementation, following pressure from the Finance Sector Union.
CBA admitted its assessment was flawed and offered affected employees options to remain, apply elsewhere, or exit.
